sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' const Input = () => { //get form input value using state const [input, setInput] = useState({ name : '', email: '', cell : '', uname : '' }); console.log(input); // validating the form const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if( input.name === '' || input.email === '' || input.cell === ''|| input.uname === ''){ alert('tor maire baap') } } return ( <>
setInput( {...input, name:e.target.value} )}/>
setInput( {...input, email:e.target.value} )}/>
setInput( {...input, cell:e.target.value} )}/>
setInput( {...input, uname:e.target.value} )}/>
) } export default Input
